ch.bfh.btx8053.w2016.white.HVmanager.persistence

Class DatabaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.btx8053.w2016.white.HVmanager.persistence.DatabaseConnector

  • public class DatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    DatabaseConnector connects to the database
    and provides CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete).
    Author:
    nedot1
